article:
Tom is thirty years old and he is from England. He is an English teacher in China now,  _  he wants to be an actor. He  _  like Jackie Chan. He is  _  medium height and he has a big nose, big eyes and black long curly hair. Sometimes he  _  a pair of black glasses. He is good at  _  stories and he is friendly to his students, _ . He often says to his students, "If you study hard, your dreams will  come true ."He can also make his classes  _ . He likes his students and all of his students also like  _ . He often plays with his students after school.
Last Sunday, the weather was beautiful, so he  _ his students to the beach. They  _  beach volleyball there in the morning. In the afternoon, they went to the  _ . They went there  _  bike. They visited a farm. After that they  _  fishing. They were tired but they  _  a great time.
